mapper.select: select * from tb_area where active=0 order by area_seq asc
select a.areaname,o.officename,o.office_seq from tb_office o join tb_area a on o.area_seq=a.area_seq where o.active=0 order by o.area_seq asc, o.office_seq asc

select a.area_seq,a.areaname,o.office_seq,o.officename,d.department_seq,d.departmentname from tb_department d join tb_office o on o.office_seq=d.office_seq join tb_area a on a.area_seq=o.area_seq where d.active=0 order by a.area_seq asc, o.office_seq asc, d.department_seq asc

select a.areaname,o.officename,d.departmentname,employeenumber,birth,employeename,employeeposition from tb_employee e join tb_department d on e.department_seq=d.department_seq join tb_office o on e.office_seq=o.office_seq join tb_area a on a.area_seq=o.area_seq where e.active=0
